description.zh-cn: 中国机械制造专家，曾任南京航空学院副院长、院长、教授、博士生导师。
description.en: A Chinese expert in mechanical manufacturing, he served as vice president, president, professor, and doctoral supervisor at Nanjing Aeronautical Institute.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国浙江省下辖的地级市。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Zhejiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 南京航空航天大学的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 一门应用工程、物理与材料科学的原理，来设计、分析、制造及维护机械系统的学科。
description.en: A discipline that applies the principles of engineering, physics, and materials science for the design, analysis, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems.
Yu Chengye was a native of Wenzhou, Zhejiang.

position.zh-cn: 副院长、院长、教授、博士生导师
position.en: Vice President, President, Professor, Doctoral Supervisor

description.zh-cn: 余承业曾担任南京航空学院的副院长、院长、教授及博士生导师。
description.en: Yu Chengye served as Vice President, President, Professor, and Doctoral Supervisor at Nanjing Aeronautical Institute.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类“中国共产党党员”，余承业是中国共产党的成员。
description.en: According to the page category 'Communist Party of China members', Yu Chengye was a member of the Communist Party of China.
